title: ESPN NBA Draft Analyst Mike Schmitz
description:
ESPN NBA Draft Analyst Mike Schmitz joins The Woj Pod in the wake of the lottery, discussing Chet Holmgren and Jabari Smith at No. 1 for the Orlando Magic, the Oklahoma City Thunder and Sam Presti at No. 2, running through the rest of the lottery, and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
